title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, when attempting to move them, they have no effect. This issue is particularly noticeable when opening a small image such as an icon, as the scrollbars are misleading and do not provide any functionality.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled.
3. Attempt to move the scrollbars.
4. Observe that they do not have any effect.
5. Open a small image, such as an icon.
6. Notice that the scrollbars are present but misleading, as they do not provide any functionality.
